response:
MRI of the entire neuraxis is the gold standard to visualise plaques and confirm dissemination in space. Lumbar puncture is indicated to detect oligoclonal bands supporting a diagnosis of MS. A comprehensive blood panel is necessary to exclude infectious, metabolic, and other autoimmune mimics (e.g., NMO/MOG).
